response_parsed.title: Combining ftplib with Typing for Production-Ready Code in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer demonstrates how to write robust and type-safe FTP client code using ftplib and Python's Type Hints (typing) in version 3.12+.
key_points: Utilize typing.Protocol for defining custom data types
Use context managers with the FTP connection for easier handling of resources
Implement type hints for functions and methods to improve code readability and maintainability
Handle errors and exceptions effectively for production-ready code
